basics.name: Willard Peralta Jr.
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I graduated from the University of Hawai'i at MƒÅnoa in Spring 2020 with a Bachelor's of Science in Computer Science. My interests are in software engineering and data visualization.

education.institution: University of Hawaii Maui College, Kahului, HI

work.summary: Data visualization of cyber security data to guide machine learning decisions
highlights: Built web based visualizations using various Python technologies including Numpy, Matplotlib, NetworkX, and Bokeh
Evaluated, proposed, and implemented best tooling and processes to visualize large scale DoD cyber security data files
Optimized visualization by using relational databases and SQLite

work.summary: Software engineering internship at Hawaii State Digital Archives
highlights: Developed Optical Character Recognition web micro-service with Java
Researched OCR libraries and decide on the use of the Tesseract Java OCR library
As Agile/Scrum devteam member, carried out dev tasks based on user stories
Used developer tools including Java, Git, Atlassian Tools, Maven, Eclipse

work.company: UH Manoa East Asian Language and Literature
work.summary: Website Assistant for the Department of East Asian Language and Literature
highlights: Maintained website for the Department of East Asian Literature and Languages
Fixed HTML of existing web pages including faculty profiles and course directories
Met weekly with website committee to discuss specific needs of the website

work.summary: Video editor for a wedding videography company.
highlights: Edited wedding videos with Adobe Premiere Pro and Adobe Media Encoder
Synced video and audio, color corrected, organized footage, exported video files
Edited and revised projects based on client requests

awards.title: UH Manoa Dean's List
awards.summary: Earn a GPA of over 3.5 at the University of Hawaii at Manoa.
